meta.version: Tree View and Cell View Test Checklist v5.3
meta.updated: 2025-11-07 - Marked SUB NETWORK VIEWER node/edge selection tests as MANUAL (8 tests require human interaction)
meta.focus: Cell Map Network Visualizations (Tree View and Cell View)
meta.description: Test checklist with 39 total tests: 31 automated via MCP, 8 require manual execution

screenshot_policy.default: Take screenshots ONLY on test failures to document errors
exceptions: First view of Tree View and Cell View (tests 1.1, 2.1)
screenshot_policy.note: Snapshots are always taken for element identification, but visual screenshots should be reserved for failures

required_network.name: U2OS Multi-scale Integrated Cell Map
required_network.description: Cell map network that enables Tree View and Cell View visualizations
required_network.note: Tree View and Cell View tabs only appear for cell map networks with hierarchical structure

test_execution_order.note: Execute tests in this order to ensure proper setup and avoid state conflicts
order: 0_setup - Load required cell map network from NDEx
1_tree_view_complete - Complete Tree View testing (display, zoom, tables, node selection, sub-network viewer)
2_cell_view_complete - Complete Cell View testing (display, zoom, tables, node selection, sub-network viewer)
3_subnetwork_filters - Test SUB NETWORK VIEWER filter panel and controls
4_controls - Test share buttons in both views

0_setup.description: Setup: Load cell map network from NDEx to enable Tree View and Cell View

tests.name: Navigate to Cytoscape Web
Open network from NDEx
Search for and load MuSIC network by UUID

steps.text: Search for MuSIC network using UUID: c380c4be-ae09-11f0-a218-005056ae3c32

steps.target: search button or press Enter to search

steps.text: U2OS Multi-scale Integrated Cell Map

steps.target: the MuSIC network from search results
button to load/open the selected network

steps.text: TREE VIEW

steps.condition: Network loaded - TREE VIEW and CELL VIEW tabs appear

tests.importance: CRITICAL - Tree/Cell View tabs only appear for cell map networks

tests.name: Verify Tree View and Cell View tabs present
tests.importance: Confirms cell map network visualization tabs are available

1_tree_view_complete.description: Tree View Complete Testing: Display, zoom, tables, node selection, and sub-network viewer
1_tree_view_complete.prerequisite: Cell map network (MuSIC) must be loaded

tests.name: Access Tree View and verify map displays

steps.condition: Canvas displays tree visualization with hierarchical structure

steps.note: EXCEPTION: First view of Tree View

tests.name: Verify zoom controls work in Tree View

steps.condition: Tree structure fits within visible area

tests.name: Verify NODES table shows all rows

steps.function: () => { const rows = document.querySelectorAll('tbody tr'); return { rowCount: rows.length, expectedCount: 276 }; }
steps.note: Verify NODES table shows all 276 nodes from U2OS network

steps.condition: NODES table displays all 276 nodes from the network

tests.name: Verify EDGES table shows all rows

steps.function: () => { const rows = document.querySelectorAll('tbody tr'); return { rowCount: rows.length, expectedCount: 298 }; }
steps.note: Verify EDGES table shows all 298 edges from U2OS network

steps.condition: EDGES table displays all 298 edges from the network

tests.name: Select Mitochondrion node using text search

steps.condition: Mitochondrion node is selected in tree canvas

steps.note: Verify NODES table shows only 1 row (Mitochondrion)

steps.condition: NODES table displays ONLY the selected Mitochondrion node (1 row)

tests.name: Verify EDGES table still shows all rows

steps.function: () => { const rows = document.querySelectorAll('tbody tr'); return { rowCount: rows.length, expectedCount: 298 }; }
steps.note: Verify EDGES table still shows all 298 edges

steps.condition: EDGES table still displays all 298 edges (node selection doesn't filter edges)

tests.name: Clear all selections in Tree View

steps.function: () => { const canvas = document.querySelector('canvas'); if (canvas) { const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect(); const safeX = rect.left + 20; const safeY = rect.top + 20; const bgEvent = new MouseEvent('click', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, view: window, clientX: safeX, clientY: safeY }); canvas.dispatchEvent(bgEvent); return `Clicked canvas at top-left corner to clear (${safeX}, ${safeY})`; } return 'Canvas not found'; }
steps.note: Click empty area of canvas to deselect nodes/edges

steps.condition: NODES table now displays all nodes

steps.function: () => { const canvas = document.querySelector('canvas'); if (canvas) { const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect(); const safeX = rect.left + 20; const safeY = rect.top + 20; const bgEvent = new MouseEvent('click', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, view: window, clientX: safeX, clientY: safeY }); canvas.dispatchEvent(bgEvent); return `Clicked canvas at top-left corner to clear (${safeX}, ${safeY})`; } return 'Canvas not found'; }

3_subnetwork_filters.description: SUB NETWORK VIEWER Filters: Test filter panel and controls
3_subnetwork_filters.prerequisite: Mitochondrion subsystem loaded in SUB NETWORK VIEWER (from Section 2 test 2.8)

tests.name: Verify filter panel is displayed

steps.condition: Filter panel is visible below the sub-network canvas

tests.name: Verify filter toggles work properly

steps.text: Identify available filter toggle controls

tests.name: Verify gear icon displays filter settings

steps.condition: Filter settings dialog or panel appears

tests.name: Verify unchecking 'integrated interactions' hides all edges

steps.text: Find checkbox labeled 'integrated interactions'

steps.function: () => { const edges = document.querySelectorAll('line, path[d*="M"]'); const visibleEdges = Array.from(edges).filter(e => e.style.display !== 'none' && e.style.visibility !== 'hidden'); return { totalEdges: edges.length, visibleEdges: visibleEdges.length }; }
steps.note: Verify all edges are hidden in sub-network viewer

steps.condition: All edges disappear from sub-network canvas

tests.importance: CRITICAL - Verifies integrated interactions filter controls edge visibility

tests.name: Re-enable integrated interactions and verify edges reappear

steps.function: () => { const edges = document.querySelectorAll('line, path[d*="M"]'); const visibleEdges = Array.from(edges).filter(e => e.style.display !== 'none' && e.style.visibility !== 'hidden'); return { totalEdges: edges.length, visibleEdges: visibleEdges.length }; }
steps.note: Verify edges are visible again in sub-network viewer

4_controls.description: View Controls: Test share buttons in both views

tests.name: Test share button in Tree View
Test share button in Cell View
Remove test network from workspace

steps.target: button 'Remove the network from workspace' for MuSIC network

steps.condition: MuSIC network removed - Tree/Cell View tabs disappear

tests.name: Clear all networks (optional full cleanup)

execution_strategy.step1: Always start with take_snapshot to get current page UIDs
execution_strategy.step2: Identify target element by its text content or role
execution_strategy.step3: Use the UID from snapshot for precise clicking
execution_strategy.step4: After each action, take another snapshot to verify state
execution_strategy.step5: Use take_screenshot ONLY on test failures or explicitly noted exceptions
execution_strategy.note: Tree View and Cell View are only available for cell map networks with hierarchical structure

important_notes.network_requirement: Tree View and Cell View tabs ONLY appear when a cell map network (like MuSIC) is loaded from NDEx

visualization_types.tree_view: Hierarchical tree structure showing parent-child relationships
visualization_types.cell_view: Circle packing layout with nested circles representing cellular compartments

important_notes.integration: Both views integrate with SUB NETWORK VIEWER for detailed subsystem exploration
important_notes.controls: Standard controls (fit, share) available in both view modes
important_notes.table_behavior: Node selection filters NODES table to show only selected node, but EDGES table shows all edges
important_notes.selection_persistence: Selecting a node loads its sub-network in SUB NETWORK VIEWER
